scripts.mock:lift-listener: UV_CACHE_DIR=/tmp/uv-cache uv --directory mock-client run --with websockets python cuboid_lift_listener.py --scene-id scene-1 --include-characters --include-objects
scripts.mock:bed-sequence: UV_CACHE_DIR=/tmp/uv-cache uv --directory mock-client run --with websockets python dual_channel_loop.py --scene-id scene-1 --sequence-json sequences/bed_rise_and_walk.json --with-character-upserts --with-robot-pose --scene-loop-count 1 --det-loop-count 0 --det-interval 0.6
